text: Bosnia and Herzegovina, represented by the Olympic Committee of Bosnia and Herzegovina (BiH OK), sent a team to compete in the 2008 Summer Olympics in Beijing, China. The team consisted of 5 competitors.Olimpijski komitet Bosne i Hercegovine ==Athletics== ;Key *Note–Ranks given for track events are within the athlete's heat only *Q = Qualified for the next round *q
